thread.title: Bayer to win EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto deal - sources

title: Bayer to win EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto deal - sources
text:
Bayer to win EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto deal - sources   01:05 
German drug and crop chemicals maker Bayer is set to win conditional European Union antitrust approval for its $62.5 billion bid for world No. 1 seed company Monsanto, sources told Reuters. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
German drug and crop chemicals maker Bayer is set to win conditional European Union antitrust approval for its $62.5 billion bid for world No. 1 seed company Monsanto, sources told Reuters. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2COf4s4
